title: I Dream of Jeannie with the Light Brown Hair

sources.title: I Dream of Jeannie with the Light Brown Hair
sources.description: As he struggles for just the right words to a song he wrote, composer Stephen Foster falls in love with his fiance's sister. You can read more about this film on it's IMDb page . This movie is already on the internet archives, but I've reformatted it so that it will embed and play with no errors.
